response.overview: In a futuristic metropolis pulsing with neon lights and hidden secrets, a reclusive hacker discovers a mysterious signal that echoes through the cityâ€™s digital underworld. As she delves deeper, she uncovers a conspiracy that could shatter the fragile balance between human and machine. With time running out and unlikely allies by her side, she must race to decode the truth before the echoes consume everything she loves.
response.tagline: "The signal is calling. The future is listening."
response.title: Echoes of the Neon Sky
